name: Tesla Model S
description: Tesla Model S is an all-electric luxury sedan known for its groundbreaking technology, impressive performance, and long electric range.
design_and_styling_features: Features a sleek and aerodynamic design with a minimalist interior and a large touchscreen display.
engine_options_range: Comes with various battery options, offering different ranges, from Long Range to Plaid.
technology_safety_features: Equipped with advanced Autopilot and Full Self-Driving features, including adaptive cruise control and lane-keeping assist.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Offers a spacious and luxurious interior with premium materials, a panoramic roof, and advanced infotainment.

name: Tesla Model X
description: Tesla Model X is a premium electric SUV known for its distinctive falcon-wing doors, versatile interior, and impressive performance.
design_and_styling_features: Features a unique design with falcon-wing doors for easy access and a spacious and versatile interior.
engine_options_range: Available in various battery options, offering different electric ranges and performance capabilities.
technology_safety_features: Equipped with Tesla's advanced Autopilot system and safety features, including collision avoidance and emergency braking.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Offers seating for up to seven passengers, a large panoramic windshield, and a high-tech infotainment system.

name: Tesla Model 3
description: Tesla Model 3 is a compact electric sedan known for its affordability, impressive range, and advanced technology.
design_and_styling_features: Features a minimalist and modern design with a simplified interior and a touchscreen display.
engine_options_range: Available in various battery options, offering different electric ranges and performance levels.
technology_safety_features: Equipped with Autopilot features and Tesla's advanced driver-assistance technology.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Offers a comfortable and tech-savvy interior with features like autopilot and over-the-air software updates.

name: Tesla Model Y
description: Tesla Model Y is a compact electric SUV with a focus on versatility, space, and impressive electric range.
design_and_styling_features: Features a design similar to the Model 3 but in a compact SUV form, with a spacious interior and rear hatch.
engine_options_range: Available with different battery options, providing various electric ranges and performance capabilities.
technology_safety_features: Equipped with advanced Autopilot features and safety technology, including collision warning and emergency braking.
luxury_and_comfort_features: Offers a roomy and practical interior with a large touchscreen, comfortable seating, and generous cargo space.
